title: [Completed] Unscheduled Channel Maintenance - January 3, 2024
content: The unscheduled channel maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.

title: MapleStory x Sunright Tea Livestream
content: Join Community Manager Veeraah in the next Community Livestream as he showcases the Sunright Tea drinks available now!

title: Cash Shop Update for January 3
content: Gachapon Update, Premium Surprise Style Box, and more!

title: Miracle Winter - January 6 - Tops/Bottoms/Overalls/Capes
content: On Saturday, January 6, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Tops, Bottoms, Overalls and Cape Equipment!

title: Hang Out with MapleStory at Sunright Tea Studio!
content: Help us launch our collaboration with Sunright Tea Studio. Join us in Los Angeles on Jan. 6!

title: Cash Shop Update for December 27
content: Royal Styles, Chunky Cable-Knit Package, Winter Covers, and more!
